alert.note: Alert for Harding (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 10:08PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Harding County through 1045 PM MDT... At 1007 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 3 miles northeast of Gustave, or 26 miles southwest of Buffalo, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Harding, Gustave, East Short Pines and West Short Pines. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
